original_title: SAJ Associates integrates with George Steuart Health
original_body_lines: SAJ Associates Founder Jayampathy Arambepola (left) with George Steuart Health Managing Director Erandajith Ranasinghe

SAJ Associate Ltd., (SAJ), a SME processing high quality NMRA certified, handmade glycerine medicated soaps locally, has integrated with George Steuart Health Ltd. (GSH) to supply their medicated soap requirements in the county.

GSH Managing Director Erandajith Ranasinghe said: “We are very confident that SAJ will deliver our expectations as we are aware of their high-quality standards. Initially we will have two products but later we will research the changing consumer and market needs and expand on the range.”

”As an importer of medical drugs, we are thinking ahead and we will seriously use our partnerships with drug companies internationally to find export markets for these high-quality medicated soaps as a source of forex earning,” Ranasinghe added.
He further stated: “The partnership is a move towards building and uplifting local entrepreneurs, in line with the vision of our Group chairman Dilith Jayaweera.”

SAJ Associates Founder Jayampathy Arambepola said: “We are highly elated and excited to be integrated with George Steuart Health - a major player in the healthcare segment. It is a major achievement for us and we are committed to work long term with GSH and ensure the best quality, NMRA certified products in a win-win situation.”

“Our products carry the least chemicals and only have ingredients of plant-based oils to the fast-changing world trend of natural products. In conclusion he said, “We are also very thankful to GSH for taking a proactive decision in assisting us with export opportunities with their worldwide pharma and other excellent connections they have acquired over the decades to help and assist good SMEs,” Arambepola added.
